short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Context Overlay enables users to easily learn software by guiding them where to click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Context Overlay is a tool that enables users to easily learn how to navigate software by giving users the ability to select tasks from a menu and then guiding them through the process step by step in real time.

It not only streamlines workflows but also empowers individuals to take charge of their responsibilities without constant oversight. This kind of autonomy can lead to quicker task completion and the immediate addition of value to the company. It's a great example of how technology can facilitate efficiency and effectiveness in modern workplaces.
